channel.title: CVE Feed for nexryai -- nexkey
channel.description: The latest CVEs for nexryai -- nexkey

item.title: CVE-2023-43805|2024-08-02T19:52:11.345Z -- nexryai -- nexkey
item.description: Nexkey is a fork of Misskey, an open source, decentralized social media platform. Prior to version 12.121.9, incomplete URL validation can allow users to bypass authentication for access to the job queue dashboard. Version 12.121.9 contains a fix for this issue. As a workaround, it may be possible to avoid this by blocking access using tools such as Cloudflare's WAF.

item.title: CVE-2023-49095|2024-08-02T21:46:29.222Z -- nexryai -- nexkey
item.description: nexkey is a microblogging platform. Insufficient validation of ActivityPub requests received in inbox could allow any user to impersonate another user in certain circumstances. This issue has been patched in version 12.122.2.
